entry.title: Tillandsia Capitata Salmon Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 15.00 - 25.00 (2 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Tillandsia 'Capitata Salmon' are fun, curly little air plants with gorgeous silvery green leaves. Its shape is a somewhat symmetrical rosette. When it blooms the leaves blush beautiful shades of orange and pink
    • COLOR: Silvery green leaves that blush orange/pink in bloom. Purple blossom.
    • WATER: Misting Weekly with a long bath Monthly
    • MOUNTING: Open container or wood mounting.
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico, Cuba, Guatemala, Honduras and the Dominican Republic
  • Size Width Height
    Small  4-5 Inches 6-8 Inches
    Large 5-6 Inches 10-12 Inches

entry.title: Giant Tillandsia Tectorum Ecuador Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: airplant
Price: 75.00

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Available in limited quantities only. One of the most sought-after tillandsia that we have! An adorable easy care plant. The trichomes create the bright white appearance. The inflorescence (spike) is purple with lavender blooms.
    • COLOR: White and fluffy
    • WATER: Tillandsia Tectorum likes to be misted lightly daily in a drier climate if there isn't sufficient dew in the morning or a mid level of humidity. It needs to dry rather quickly so a light to medium mist is sufficient. It does not do well in high heat with heavy humidity since it needs to dry sufficiently. Make sure it gets lots of air circulation if outdoors in humid condition
    • MOUNTING: Excellent globe plant
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Ecuador, Peru, Bolivia
  • Size Width Height
    Giant About 12 inches About 12 inches

entry.title: Medium Tillandsia Xerographica - 3 for $30 Special - Limited Time
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 30.00 - 90.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • MEDIUM XEROGRAPHICA 3 for $3. Coupon codes do not apply to this special price: Silvery light green in color, Xerographica is one of the more rare varieties. Thick, wide leaves form a tight rosette of curls with the thin, spiky new growth sprouting from the center adding a beautiful contrast in form.
    • DISPLAY: The large Xerographicas looks beautiful on its own while the small plants look great when grouped in multiples.
    • COLOR: Minty green with tinges of pin. Spectacular blossom when in bloom.
    • WATER: Soak once a week. Leave upside so that water drips out of the center.
    • MOUNTING: Great for large displays and driftwood
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico and Guatemala
  • Size Height Width
    Medium 3-4 Inches 5-6 Inches

entry.title: Tillandsia 'Heather's Blush Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 11.50 - 46.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Heather's Blush is a large, showy hybrid air plant. It's leaves are curly, smooth, and shiny green
    • COLOR: Light mint green leaves with a purplish tint in blush. Produces a pink flower in bloom. Occasionally has pink or purple mottling on the leaves.
    • WATER: Weekly misting, occasional soak
    • MOUNTING: Great on driftwood, cork, and larger displays
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Hybrid
  • Width Height
     3-4 Inches  4-7 Inches

entry.title: Tillandsia Bulbosa Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 4.95 - 31.80 (6 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Bright grassy green with magenta accents, these guys have smooth and shiny arms making them look very different from most of the other fuzzy, scale-covered plants.
    • COLOR: Dark green with purple-red accents.
    • WATER: Misting weekly, more often in dry conditions.
    • MOUNTING: Excellent for most displays. Globe Terrariums, shells
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Guatemala (smaller) Belize (larger)
  • Size Width Height
    Regular (Guatemala) 3-5 Inches 3-5 Inches
    Large (Belize) 3-5 Inches 6-9 Inches

entry.title: Beautiful Seedling Tillandsia Xerographica - 3 for $25 Special - Limited Time
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type:
Price: 25.00 - 75.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • SEEDLING XEROGRAPHICA 3 for $25. Coupon codes not applicable to this special offer. Silvery light green in color, Xerographica is one of the more rare varieties. Thick, wide leaves form a tight rosette of curls with the thin, spiky new growth sprouting from the center adding a beautiful contrast in form. These are beautiful, symmetric plants that are sustainably grown by seed in Guatemala. Purchasing these plants helps support sustainable air plant farming practices.
    • DISPLAY: The Xerographica looks beautiful on its own while the small plants look great when grouped in multiples.
    • COLOR: Minty green with tinges of pin. Spectacular blossom when in bloom.
    • WATER: Soak once a week. Leave upside so that water drips out of the center.
    • MOUNTING: Great for large displays and driftwood
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico and Guatemala
  • Size Height Width
    Medium 1-2 Inches 2-4 Inches

entry.title: Curly Tillandsia Streptophylla - Pure - Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 7.95 - 11.95 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Streptophylla Air Plants are a curly, irregular tillandsia with thick, pastel-green leaves. The ends of the leaves have the tendency to curl under the base of the plant. Some have commented that Streptophylla look like a very small xerographica. These are currently available in very limited quantities.
    • COLOR: Green with deep red blush
    • WATER: Misting 2-3 per week
    • MOUNTING: Mounts well on Wood.
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Guatemala and Mexico
  • Size Width
    Small 1-2 Inches
    Medium 2-4 Inches
    Large 4+ Inches

entry.title: Tillandsia Flabellata Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 4.95 - 6.95 (2 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Tillandsia Flabellata is an air plant with thick, shiny leaves. The leaves range from a deep green to a maroon.Our plants are the vigorous Guatemalan variant. They are relatively quick growers and can get as tall as 12 inches. When in bloom, a simple orange to red bloom is produced.
    • COLOR: Green and red 'rubra' forms
    • WATER: Mist often and soak once a week
    • MOUNTING: This is one of the few species that can actually be planted in well-draining orchid mix or sphagnum moss (similar to T. Cyanea). Otherwise, display like other tillandsia in terrariums, wood or other containers.
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Central America
  • Size Width Height
    Regular 3-5 Inches 5-7 Inches
    Large 5-7 Inches 6-9 Inches

entry.title: Tillandsia Brachycaulos X Concolor 'Sparkler' Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 11.50 - 46.00 (3 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: 'Sparkler' is a large, showy hybrid air plant. It's leave are straight, smooth, and a shiny deep green. When in bloom, this species sends a long stalk of red and purple flowers like a 4th of July sparkler! 
    • COLOR: Forest green leaves that turn burgundy when the plant is in bloom
    • WATER: Weekly misting, occasional soak
    • MOUNTING: Great in small red pots and glass orbs
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Hybrid; parents Brachycaulos and Concolor
  • Width Height
     4-7 Inches  4-7 Inches

entry.title: Tillandsia Funkiana Large Hanging Cluster with Wire Hook
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 17.95

  • Description
  • Size
    • A must for any collector! When left to grow on their own, Funckiana air plants produce amazing clusters of plants. Each of these clusters contains 8-15 individual plants (plus some small pups) that have naturally been natural left to grown into a family over the course of a couple of years. When in bloom, pink, orange and purple blooming colors burst from all directions. It is best to display these in a bright location. Some of our clusters contain a couple blooming plants while others are primarily green, but don't worry your's will show its colors soon! Each hanging ball comes with a wire hook for hanging.
    • COLOR: Varying shades of blue-green with red blooms
    • WATER: Mist frequuently with weekly water bath
    • MOUNTING: Easy to hang with included wire hanger
  • Width Height
    3-5 Inches 5-8 Inches plus wire hook

entry.title: Tillandsia Concolor Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 8.95 - 79.80 (6 variants)

  • Description
  • Size
    • FORM: Concolor is a spiky air plant that readily hybridizes with other air plant varieties.  It's leave are spiky, rigid, and blush yellow during bloom. When in bloom, this species sends a tall orange and yellow inflorescence. 
    • COLOR: Dark green silvery leaves that blush red.
    • WATER: Misting or water but let dry out quickly and fully between waterings
    • MOUNTING: Super great in Globes, wood, terrarium, etc
    • NATIVE HABITAT: Mexico
  • Size Width Height
    Regular 3-5 Inches 3-5 Inches
    Large - Variety 'Cuicatlán' 5-7 Inches 8-12 Inches

entry.title: 10 Medium & Large Premium Tillandsia Air Plants
entry.summary:
Vendor: Air Plant City
Type: air plant
Price: 36.75

  • Description
  • Size
    • COMBINATION PACK: Brachycaulos Abdita, Streptophylla Hybrid, Sparkler, Heather's Blush, Fasciculata, Stricta, Juncea, Harrisii, and Capitata Peach. The Selection can vary depending on availability and which air plants look the best. I try to send plants that are in blush, coming into the budding season.

    • WATER: Mist with weekly water bath
    • MOUNTING: Great for driftwood and larger displays
